title: This Diwali, try the black and silver midnight magic look
text:
Who doesn’t love the perfect smoky eye? Reinvented classic black smoky eyes with a touch of silver are so in rage this season. If you want to turn heads or show off your polished makeup skills, this look is the one to go-for! And of course the first thing we wanted to change about this staple look was the restriction on when it can be worn.



Here we give our own spin to the trend, and show you how to wear it even during the day. Silver smoky eye is still one of the most searched tutorials online. Much like the classic little black dress, it is the go-to party makeup for many girls. And the sultry eye makeup is not that hard to try yourself.
description: Who doesn’t love the perfect smokey eye? Reinvented black smoky eyes with a touch of silver are so in rage this season.
